SELECT t.type_name,b.* FROM book AS b inner JOIN material_type AS t ON b.type = t.id and SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast('${type}' as decimal(9,2)))),'-',-1) = '${type}' WHERE b.is_on_sale =1 and b.is_highly=1 AND (b.deadline_promote > now() or b.deadline_promote is null) ORDER BY b.sort_highly
limit ${startrows},${endrows}

select t0.id as id0,t0.path as path0 ,t0.type_name as type_name0 ,t1.id as id1,t1.path as path1 ,t1.type_name as type_name1 ,t2.id as id2,t2.path as path2 ,t2.type_name as type_name2 ,t3.id as id3,t3.path as path3 ,t3.type_name as type_name3
from ( select * from material_type m inner join ( select concat(m.path,'-',m.id,'-') full_path from material_type m inner join book b on b.type = m.id and b.is_on_sale =1 group by m.id limit 2 )p on p.full_path REGEXP concat('^.*-',m.id,'-.*') where m.path = '0' group by m.id )t0
left join ( select * from material_type m inner join ( select concat(m.path,'-',m.id,'-') full_path from material_type m inner join book b on b.type = m.id and b.is_on_sale =1 group by m.id )p on p.full_path REGEXP concat('^.*-',m.id,'-.*') where path REGEXP '^0(-[^-]*){1}$' group by m.id )t1 on t0.id = t1.parent_id
left join ( select * from material_type m inner join ( select concat(m.path,'-',m.id,'-') full_path from material_type m inner join book b on b.type = m.id and b.is_on_sale =1 group by m.id )p on p.full_path REGEXP concat('^.*-',m.id,'-.*') where path REGEXP '^0(-[^-]*){2}$' group by m.id )t2 on t1.id = t2.parent_id
left join ( select * from material_type m inner join ( select concat(m.path,'-',m.id,'-') full_path from material_type m inner join book b on b.type = m.id and b.is_on_sale =1 group by m.id )p on p.full_path REGEXP concat('^.*-',m.id,'-.*') where path REGEXP '^0(-[^-]*){3}$' group by m.id )t3 on t2.id = t3.parent_id
where t0.id in (${firstTypeIds})
order by t0.sort, t1.sort , t2.sort , t3.sort

SELECT t.type_name,b.* FROM book AS b inner JOIN material_type AS t ON b.type = t.id and SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast('${type}' as decimal(9,2)))),'-',-1) = '${type}' WHERE b.is_on_sale =1 and b.is_new_book=1 AND (b.deadline_new > now() or b.deadline_new is null) ORDER BY b.sort_new_book
limit ${startrows},${endrows}

SELECT u.id,b.id id1,b.bookname,b.image_url,c.content,c.score, CASE WHEN (u.nickname IS NOT NULL && u.nickname !='') THEN u.nickname ELSE u.username END as nickname FROM book AS b INNER JOIN (SELECT * from book_user_comment GROUP BY book_id HAVING is_auth = 1 AND is_hide = 0 AND is_deleted = 0 and front=1)AS c ON b.id = c.book_id INNER JOIN writer_user AS u ON c.writer_id = u.id ORDER BY b.comments ASC
limit ${startrows},${endrows}

SELECT t.type_name,b.* FROM book AS b inner JOIN material_type AS t ON b.type = t.id and SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(CONCAT(t.path,'-',t.id),'-', (select cast( (CHAR_LENGTH(path)-CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(path,'-','')))/CHAR_LENGTH('-')+2 as decimal(9,2) ) from material_type where id = cast('${type}' as decimal(9,2)))),'-',-1) = '${type}' where b.is_on_sale = 1 and b.is_sell_well=1 ORDER BY b.sort_sell_well
limit ${startrows},${endrows}
select IFNULL(sort,0) as max from book_sell_well order by sort desc LIMIT 1
